page.title: 17CHILDREN'S FOOD
page.content: The diet today in this area reflects the efficiency of maritime transport, food preservation techniques and the high standard of living locally. In a survey carried out by Steven Camp and Daniel Luck of their form they found that the three most popular meals were: *Fish and Chips (11), *Hamburger and Chips (9) and *Spaghetti Bolognaisse (5). Vegetables were notably lacking ! Snacks form an important part of the daily diet and take the form of *Potato Crisps, *Biscuits and *Chips. *Canned fizzy drinks were very popular, especially Coca Cola. Many dieticians are worried about the lack of balance in this diet and also about the level of preservatives in modern 'fast foods'. 'Health foods' are now becoming popular with many people.
